data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Toshino, Sho (2017): Scolionema sanshin sp. n., a new species (Hydrozoa, Limnomedusae, Olindiidae) from the Ryukyu Archipelago, southern Japan. Zootaxa 4344 (2): 277-290, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4344.2.4|3 occurrences
